title: EPPS6302 Methods of Data Collection and Production
text: This is the project documentation for EPPS6302 Methods of Data Collection and Production, 2024 Fall

title: About
text:
I am a Ph.D. student in political science in UTD EPPS department.
Coordinator: Mamie Cincotta

title: Assignment 1
text:
A movie survey demonstration

Survey Analysis
The survey start with a message to the participants, followed with a list of preference choices about the movie consumption, then the survey asked a series of questions regarding their opinions upon certain issues, and finished with demographic and economic status questions.
The race and zip code questions are not found in Demographics/US demographics survey.


Improvements

Bot detection: Google reCAPTCHA integration has been enabled.

What else should be done:

Texts in question 2 is too long for that format. Participants with low vision, reading capability or disabilities may have disadvantages completing the survey, so they may be under represented in the data.
Question 2 5 and 6 may be not mobile friendly depending users’ device.



Further assignment:
The Diversity and Inclusiveness Survey cannot be found under your library/Qualtrics library.
But when compared with the similar questions under Demographics/Demographics, the income and education questions are different.
For the income quesiton, the demographic question has a better articulated, because it specified geussing for the previous year’s pre tax income.
In the demographic question, the step width of the income question smaller and the range is wider.
Education question is not mentioned in the movie survey.

title: Assignment 2
text:
1. Contact List and Distribution
Done by using Qualtrics.


2. Google Trends Data
Google Trend of the two candidates this year in US.



Google Trend of the two candidates this year in US


Google Trend difference of the two candidates this year in US



Google Trend difference of the two candidates this year in US


Google Trend of election this year in US



Google Trend of election this year in US


The two vertical lines represent the date when Trump attempted assassination (red) and when Biden dropped out (blue).
We can see that even though the two events may not increase the search for election, they did increase the trends for the candidates respectively. Even though the increase in search trend for Harris was still lower than Trump’s highest number, the impact of the second event (Biden’s dropout) on the difference in the trend was indeed strong.
